name: Neck Stretch
description: Tilt your head to the left, feeling the stretch on the right side of your neck. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Hamstring Stretch
description: Sit on the floor with one leg extended and the other bent. Lean forward, reaching towards your toes, feeling the stretch in the back of your leg. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Shoulder Stretch
description: Bring your left arm across your chest, using your right hand to press it closer to your body. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Upper Back Stretch
description: Sit or stand tall. Clasp your hands together in front of you and round your upper back, pressing your hands away from you. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Chest Stretch
description: Extend your arms out to the sides, then bring them behind your back, interlocking your fingers and opening your chest. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Quad Stretch
description: Stand tall, grab one foot with your hand, and pull it towards your glutes, feeling the stretch in the front of your thigh. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Calf Stretch
description: Stand facing a wall with one foot in front of the other. Lean forward, keeping your back heel on the ground, feeling the stretch in your calf. Hold for 15 seconds on each side.

name: Hip Flexor Stretch
description: Kneel on one knee, with the other foot in front, and lean forward, feeling the stretch in the front of your hip. Hold for 15 seconds.

name: Triceps Stretch
description: Raise one arm overhead, bending at the elbow, and reach your hand down your back. Use your other hand to gently push on the bent elbow, feeling the stretch in your triceps. Hold for 15 seconds.
